resources.string: Air quality is good and poses little or no risk.
Sensitive individuals should avoid outdoor activity as they may experience respiratory symptoms
General public and sensitive individuals in particular are at risk to experience irritation and respiratory problems
Increased likelihood of adverse affects and aggrevation to heart and lungs among general public
General public will be noticeably affected. Individuals should remain indoors and restrcit activities
Individuals are at high risk. Everyone should avoid excercise and remain indoors
